product_name: Boulder Canyon Sport and Adventure Climber's Guide Volume II: The Upper Canyon
long_description: This guide features over 500 climbs, 140 of which have never been documented before in any other guidebook. Author: Mark Rolofson. Softcover; 112 pages; black-and-white photos; illustrated route maps. Mark Rolofson/Free West Rock Guides; copyright 2005. Covers sport and trad routes. Volume II starts above Boulder Falls at the Bowling Alley and Bell Buttress. Includes Avalon, Animal World, Vampire Rock, Black Widow Slab, Easter Rock, Coney Island Crag, Castle Rock and Sport Park.
short_description: This guide features over 500 climbs, 140 of which have never been documented before in any other guidebook.
